misc: Regularly competes in the Finnish Mid Tour as well with decent results
biography: Sami, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, is set to make his seventh appearance in the upcoming 2025 tournament. Representing Hirsala Golf, Sami is known for his consistent play and competitive spirit.

While the coveted Hector Trophée and the individual Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, Sami's dedication to the sport is unquestionable. He regularly competes in the Finnish Mid Tour, consistently achieving commendable results, a testament to his commitment and skill on the course.

Those who have had the pleasure of sharing the links with Sami often remark on his unwavering optimism and his penchant for offering a word of encouragement, even amidst the heat of competition. His affable nature makes him a popular figure among fellow competitors.
